alert.note: Alert for Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 4:11AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Calcasieu Parish through 445 AM CDT... At 410 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edgerly, or near Vinton, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Vinton, Moss Bluff, Buhler, Edgerly and Carlyss. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 7 and 33. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
